## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = pulumi.output(aws.msk.getCluster({
    clusterName: "example",
}, { async: true }));
```

## GetCluster Result {#result}

The following output properties are available:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Arn</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the MSK cluster.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Bootstrap<wbr>Brokers</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A comma separated list of one or more hostname:port pairs of Kafka brokers suitable to boostrap connectivity to the Kafka cluster.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Bootstrap<wbr>Brokers<wbr>Tls</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A comma separated list of one or more DNS names (or IPs) and TLS port pairs kafka brokers suitable to boostrap connectivity to the kafka cluster.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Cluster<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>id is the provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Kafka<wbr>Version</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Number<wbr>Of<wbr>Broker<wbr>Nodes</span>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
